attributes.action: Change the national anthem to Club Tropicana by Wham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The national anthem needs to be changed to something more jazzy and tropical and cultural. So what better than to have Club Tropicana by wham as our national anthem. Come on! Dont be mean and sign the petition!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
